CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 25, 1954, p. 11, reads: "WILY CHECK FOR HILL CITY - Bill Powell, announcer for Radio Station WILY, is shown presenting a check to the young citizens of Hill City as a result of the Christmas campaign in behalf of the youth municipality. Left to right: Marcia Ruffin, Lynette Popeck, Regis Henke, Bill Powell, Veronica Popeck, William Friday and Ulysses Winn."
TitMainTitle: Bill Powell holding WILY Radio Station microphone, presenting check for Hill City to three boys, and three girls, including Marcia Ruffin on left, Lynette and Veronica Popeck, Regis Henke, William Friday, and Ulysses Winn, posed in front of Christmas tree, another version
